sentences.en: This is the most outstanding, intact example of a troglodyte settlement in the Mediterranean region ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 马泰拉位于意大利巴西利卡塔地区的南部,是地中海地区保存最为完好、典型的史前穴居人定居点.

words.tran_cn: 类人猿；隐居者；穴居人；老顽固

trans.tran_cn: 类人猿，隐居者，穴居者，极端保守主义者
trans.tran_en: someone who lived in a  cave  in  prehistoric  times
